description: A sealed clay jug holding sanitized yeast wort.  You may harvest the yeast inside when it's done culturing.

use_action.msg: You open the jar and harvest the culture.
use_action.not_ready_msg: The yeast isn't done culturing yet.

description: Mixture of water, sugar and fruits with some naturally occuring yeast, that will eventually produce a more sizeable yeast culture.

use_action.msg: You open the jar and harvest the culture.
use_action.not_ready_msg: The yeast isn't done culturing yet.
